articles.description: Watch live coverage of day three at Wimbledon, with Carlos Alcaraz, Aryna Sabalenka and seven British players among those in second-round action.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Day three - watch live, listen to radio, text updates & latest scores

articles.description: Watch BBC One coverage, listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow live text updates as hosts Switzerland take on Norway at Euro 2025.
articles.title: Switzerland vs Norway LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: England are held up by India captain Shubman Gill's patient century as their bowlers fight admirably on day one of the second Test at Edgbaston.
articles.title: England vs India: Shubman Gill century holds up England's battling bowling effort

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary and follow live text commentary as Iceland take on Finland in the opening game of Euro 2025.
articles.title: Iceland vs Finland LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: British university student Ollie Tarvet is unable to create one of the biggest shocks in Wimbledon history against two-time champion Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Ollie Tarvet's dream run comes to an end against Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: Andy Farrell jokes that Wales flanker Jac Morgan can play "wherever he wants" in the British and Irish Lions back row after his stellar display in the win over Queensland Reds.
articles.title: Jac Morgan: Andy Farrell says British and Irish Lion back row can play 'anywhere he wants'

articles.description: Joao Pedro could play in Chelsea's Club World Cup game with Palmeiras after completing a move from Brighton.
articles.title: Joao Pedro transfer: Chelsea complete signing of Brazil forward from Brighton

articles.description: World number one Aryna Sabalenka continues her pursuit of a maiden Wimbledon title with a hard-fought victory over Czech player Marie Bouzkova.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka continues maiden SW19 title pursuit with win over Marie Bouzkova

articles.description: Sonay Kartal becomes the first British player to reach the third round of this year's Wimbledon with a dominant victory over Viktoriya Tomova.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Sonay Kartal beats Viktoriya Tomova to reach third round

articles.description: Aitana Bonmati is "so eager" to play in Spain's Euro 2025 opening match against Portugal - but she could be held back after recent hospital treatment for viral meningitis.
articles.title: Euro 2025: Spain star Aitana Bonmati 'eager' to play after meningitis health scare
